##About 

This web page will provide metadata information about the data files used for the course Introduction to R, databases and reproducibility for AMR epidemiology


### Data files:

A variety of existing and bespoke synthetic data files that were used for the training

#### Gapminder files:

- gapminder_data.csv
- gapminder_wide.csv
- gapminder_FiveYearData.csv

#### AMR related files

- hgt_wgt.csv
- icd10_data.csv
- dig_health_hub_amr_v2.csv 
- trust_data.csv

## Meta data information

### hgt_wgt.csv

Gender: Numeric 0 or 1, 1 indicating Male 
Age: Text 
Height (cm): Numeric
Weight (kg): Numeric
